lines.p: Happy is everyone who fears Jehovah,Who walks in His ways.

You will eat what your hands worked hard to produce.
You will be happy and will enjoy prosperity.
Your wife will be like a fruitful vine within your house;Your sons will be like shoots of an olive tree around your table.
Look! That is how the man who fears JehovahWill be blessed.

Jehovah will bless you from Zion.
May you see Jerusalem prosper all the days of your life

And see the sons of your sons.
May there be peace upon Israel.
